title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: If you have any questions, they are usually answered here!

first.question: Do I need to be vaccinated to travel ?
first.answer: Before going on a trip, it is important to find out what precautions to take and what vaccinations are needed in the host country. It is preferable to have all the basic vaccinations up to date, regardless of your destination. We strongly recommend that you consult your general practitioner before leaving, as he or she will be able to advise you on the best way to prepare for your trip. Some countries may require proof of vaccination to enter the country (vaccination passport, health booklet, etc)

second.question: Can I get a brochure ?
second.answer: Expat Facilities tries to be as environmentally friendly as possible by limiting printing to a minimum. That is why we do not print paper brochures. However, if you are interested in certain destinations, you can request their brochures by email at contact@expatfacilities.co !

third.question: Are the services of Expat Facilities accessible to all ?
third.answer: The services offered by Expat Facilities are mainly intended for French students who wish to study abroad, to learn a foreign language or to do a gap year.
